Text:
[II] Pray in faith with joy to Christ our Lord, who was dead, has risen, and ceaselessly intercedes for us all.
[IR] Victorious King, hear us.
[I1] Christ, light and salvation of all peoples,
[I2] pour out upon us the fire of your Spirit as we proclaim your resurrection.
[I1] May Israel recognize you as the Messiah, our ultimate hope,
[I2] and may the vastness of creation be filled with the knowledge of your glory.
[I1] Welcome and keep us in the communion of your saints,
[I2] and grant to us all rest from our labors.
[I1] You who triumphed over the enemy of death, break the power of the enemy within us,
[I2] that we may live for you, immortal conqueror.
[I1] Christ the Savior, who, becoming obedient even unto death, was exalted to the right hand of the Father,
[I2] graciously admit your siblings into the Kingdom of your glory.
Changes: 2022-04-30 - Paul Prins: Initial translation of these intentions
